notes.text:
Got my 5-in-a-row with CA to keep it notable KoG. This deck will remain relevant on the ladder as long as Sylvans are popular. It seems like a lot of Amazoness decks are also dropping ECon for Chalice and SRH due to the mirror, making them more manageable for CA.

Treacherous Trap Hole (TTH) is pretty clutch vs. Amazoness, Heroes, and overall in general. I had one game where I managed to chain 2 TTHs vs. an Amazoness deck and wiped their entire frontrow.

Use Alexis and prismatic Dakini + MAAR for good luck

#CAisdead #freedakini #natashawhen
